body:
I am packaging a library hosted at github, and encountered the following issue

```
$ spack create https://github.com/libgd/libgd/archive/gd-2.1.1.tar.gz
==> This looks like a URL for libgd version 2.1.1.
==> Creating template for package libgd
==> Found 2 versions of libgd:
  2.1.1     https://github.com/libgd/libgd/gd-2.1.1.tar.gz
  2.1.0     https://github.com/libgd/libgd/gd-2.1.0.tar.gz

Include how many checksums in the package file? (default is 5, q to abort) 
==> Downloading...
==> Trying to fetch from https://github.com/libgd/libgd/gd-2.1.1.tar.gz

curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
==> Fetching from https://github.com/libgd/libgd/gd-2.1.1.tar.gz failed.
==> Error: All fetchers failed for spack-stage-Cv18YW
```

It seems the reconstructed urls are missing a level (`/archive`).
title: `spack create` : fails fetching sources from github project
